title: Chareidi Jews Protest Draft Decree
body: Hundreds of thousands of Jews gathered in Yerushalayim for a massive atzeres tefillah to protest the draft decree and the imprisonment of bnei yeshiva refusing to enlist. They pleaded for annulment and vowed to never accept the decree.

title: Chareidi Jewry Protests Draft
body: Hundreds of thousands of Jews gathered in Yerushalayim for a massive atzeres tefillah, pleading for the annulment of the government's draft decree and protesting the imprisonment of bnei yeshiva who refuse to report to army enlistment offices.
